alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 3:51PM MDT until May 26 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN EL PASO COUNTY... At 350 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fountain, or 11 miles south of Colorado Springs, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Several reports of 0.5 inch to 1.0 inch hail have been reported throughout the Colorado Springs area. Torrential rain is occurring with these storms. Locations impacted include... Southern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Fort Carson and Security-Widefield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
